content:
That's a great plan! Online courses and resources are an excellent way to get started, and a permaculture design course will provide a solid foundation in sustainable agriculture and design principles.

Remember, learning about sustainable agriculture and farming practices is a lifelong journey. Start with what resonates with you, and gradually build your knowledge and skills. Don't be afraid to ask questions, seek guidance, and learn from others.

Permaculture design courses, in particular, are an excellent way to learn about holistic and regenerative practices that can be applied to various aspects of your life. You'll learn about designing systems that work with nature, rather than against it, and how to create resilient and thriving ecosystems.

As you dive deeper into sustainable agriculture and farming practices, you'll likely discover that it's not just about growing food, but also about building community, promoting ecological balance, and creating a more sustainable future.

Feel free to reach out if you have any more questions or need further guidance. I'm always here to help. Good luck on your learning journey, and I hope you find it rewarding and enriching!
